summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of Five Hundred (500) Dollars from the General Fund, to pay the damages to certain buildings situated on Lots One (1) and Two (2), Block Twelve (12), of Ross' Second Addition to the City of Seattle, caused by the grading of Nickerson Avenue, as provided for in Ordinance No. 12501, creating Local Improvement District No. 1096, and authorizing the drawing of a warrant therefor.
